amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Department of Energy's Global Threat Reduction Initiative.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide for a transfer of funds between NNSA and the non-proliferation account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meehan amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 235 (Roll no. 323).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Meehan.
